ProductInfo.Features:
Operating Frequencies:  GSM Quad Band - 850/900/1800/1900MHz; Supported 3G Modes 3G HSPA 850/900/1900/2100
Bluetooth, Wifi, Voice Dial, Wi-Fi Hotspot, Snapdragon S1 800MHz processor; 5MP camera with LED flash and video capture
Compatible Networks: Unlocked to work on any GSM network anywhere in the world.  USA - AT&T; / T-Mobile (2G only) ; Canada - Rogers / FIDO / Bell / Koodo / Virgin / City / Sasktel; Africa / Europe / Asia - all GSM carriers
Incompatible Networks: Canada: Wind / Mobilicity / Videoron   USA: Verizon / T-mobile 3G (check with carrier) / All CDMA carriers.
Windows Phone 7.8.; Screen Size: 3.7 " Touch Screen; Supported Languages: English, Spanish, French; SIM Card:  Micro-SIM
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia Lumia 610 3.7" LCD - 8GB - (New Unlocked) Windows Phone 7.8 Smart Phone
